channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- IronPort Web Security Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- IronPort Web Security Appliance

item.title: CVE-2012-1316|2024-08-06T18:53:37.024Z -- cisco -- ironport%20web%20security%20appliance
item.description: Cisco IronPort Web Security Appliance does not check for certificate revocation which could lead to MITM attacks

item.title: CVE-2012-1326|2024-08-06T18:53:37.205Z -- cisco -- ironport%20web%20security%20appliance
item.description: Cisco IronPort Web Security Appliance up to and including 7.5 does not validate the basic constraints of the certificate authority which could lead to MITM attacks
